text: LissotrachelusBrunner von Wattenwyl K (1893) Ann. Mus. Civ. Stor. Nat. Genova 2 13(33): 205. is an Asian genus of crickets, typical of the tribe Lissotrachelini; species records range from southern China, Indo-China to Borneo.Orthoptera Species File (version 5.0: retrieved 25 August 2019) == Species == The Orthoptera Species File lists: *Lissotrachelus ater Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 *Lissotrachelus castaneus Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 *Lissotrachelus ferrugineonotatus Brunner von Wattenwyl, 1893 \- type species (as L. ferrugineo-notatus) == References == == External links== * Category:Ensifera genera Category:crickets Category:Orthoptera of Asia
title: Lissotrachelus
